ObjAction.%comment%: Collection of Objects that are set for action and corresponding response

actresid.%comment%: Unique Identifier for a given action and response

sourceObj.%comment%: Source object where the action is applied or originated

targetObj.%comment%: Target object where the action's response is made visible

IsCollision.%comment%: Flag to determine if the action is based on collision
IsCollision.query: Yes or No if the action is based on collision

response.%comment%: Defines the type of response, i,e, natural law based response or a customized response

comment.%comment%: Illustrate in words the course of response and its journey
comment.query: the course of resonse and its journey

Syncronous.%comment%: Defines if the response is Syncronous to action or has any delay or Asyncronous to other objects
Syncronous.query: Yes or No if the response is syncronous to action

repeatactionfor.%comment%: Flag to use or repeat the same action for other objects. Mention the targetobjects ids or names
repeatactionfor.query: the other objects to apply the same action
